The QR code containing the passphrase to access your wallet is:

The QR code containing the passphrase for recovery access to your subaccount is:

This passphrase is encrypted, so your encryption password is required to use it.

Pamiętaj by przechowywać go w bezpiecznym miejscu!

The subaccount mnemonic is not stored anywhere neither by GreenAddress, nor by your browser, so you *HAVE* to back it up to have a recovery access to your 2of3 subaccount.

Twoje hasło-mnemonik

Your subaccount recovery mnemonic passphrase

Your subaccount recovery xpub

Your subaccount GreenAddress xpub
